mapper.insert: /*saveStudentMediaLearningLogResults*/ INSERT INTO aidt_lms.med_std_log_result (textbk_id, cla_id, stdt_id, menu_se_cd, trgt_id, std_cd, article_id, med_ty, med_id, med_lt, ai_tut_recmd_at, med_ply_time, med_std_cp_at, med_ply_cnt, med_ply_mute_cnt, med_ply_jump_cnt, med_ply_stop_cnt, crcul_id) VALUES (#{textbkId}, #{claId}, #{userId}, #{menuSeCd}, #{trgtId}, #{stdCd}, #{articleId}, #{medTy}, #{medId}, #{medLt}, #{aiTutRecmdAt}, #{medPlyTime}, #{medStdCpAt}, #{medPlyCnt}, #{medPlyMuteCnt}, #{medPlyJumpCnt}, #{medPlyStopCnt} ,#{crculId})
